column5: We've fished a number of outposts in recent years, focusing on smallmouth. Rarely are there walleyes and usually not much in the way of northerns. I'd like to try a new smallmouth outpost. Any thoughts?

Good luck in your search. I'm going to get some popcorn and return to this thread tonight! Smallmouth? What are you, some kind of terrorist? Love to fish 'em myself. They give me a chance to change styles and seem to be most active on calm, sunny days.
